mapper.insert: insert into notice_record (id, notice_id, user_id, read_status, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, read_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{noticeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{readStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{readTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update notice_record set notice_id = #{noticeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, read_time = #{readTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, notice_id, user_id, read_status, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, read_time from notice_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, notice_id, user_id, read_status, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, read_time from notice_record

select id, notice_id, user_id, read_status, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from notice_record where notice_id = #{noticeId} and user_id=(select id from STAFF where staff_no=#{staffNo})
select id, notice_id, user_id, read_status, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time,read_time from notice_record where notice_id = #{noticeId} and del_flg='0'
